name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Robert L. BOYLES, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
ZAPPALA, J., concurs in the result.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Robert L. BOYLES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
For the reasons stated in the opinion filed in Commonwealth v. Corporan, — Pa. -, 613 A.2d 530 (1992), we affirm.
ZAPPALA, J., concurs in the result.
CAPPY, J., notes his dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael J. Krout, York, for appellant.
William H. Graff, Jr., Deputy Prosecutor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
613 A.2d 541
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Robert L. BOYLES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 8, 1992.
Decided June 17, 1992.
Michael J. Krout, York, for appellant.
William H. Graff, Jr., Deputy Prosecutor, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
